description: Youth Mobilization and Development in Beirut and its Suburbs

subproject.description:
This project aims at both rapidly implementing socio-economic recovery activities targeting the youth, as well as enhancing the capacities of institutions (local NGOs and CSOs) at the community level of Bieurt and its suburbs, in identifying, prioritising and implementing socio-economic activities in an autonomous manner.
This target includes youth residing in the disadvantaged areas of Beirut and its suburbs, building their skills to play a leading facilitative role in the development of strategically planned, locally-driven, partnership approaches to rebuilding livelihoods.
The overall objective of the project is to promote social equity and local stakeholders' empowerment through local employment recovery and livelihood opportunities projects in Beirut and its immediate suburbs.
subproject.title: Youth Mobilization and Develop
